lines.gurmukhi: ishjw smY AgRXwn mwn kY rswey nwih qnk hI mY irswie auq ko isDwr hYN
lines.transliteration_english: Sihajaa Samai Agyaan Maan Kai Rasaaay Naahi , Tanak Hee Mai Risaai Out Ko Sidhaar Hain ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Due to my pride of youth, wealth and ignorance, I did not please my beloved Lord at the time of my meeting with Him. As a result He became cross with me and left me for some other place. (I was too preoccupied with enjoying my human life and paid no atten

lines.gurmukhi: pwCY pCqwie hwie hwie kr kr mIj mUMf Dun Dun koit jnm iDkwry hYN
lines.transliteration_english: Paachhai Pachhataai Haai Haai Kar Kar Meeja , Moond Dhoun Dhoun Koti Janam Dhikaaray Hain ?

Shabad OS B.translation: After realising the separation of my Lord, I am now repenting and grieving and beating my head, am cursing my millions births of separation from Him.

lines.gurmukhi: AOsr n pwvoN ibllwau dIn duKq h√çY ibrh ibXog sog Awqm sMGwry hYN
lines.transliteration_english: Aousar N Paavon Bilalaau Deen Doukhat Hvai , Birah Biyog Sog Aatam Sanghaaray Hain ?

Shabad OS B.translation: I cannot get this chance of meeting my Lord for ever anymore. That is why I am wailing, feeling the distress and perturbation. The separation, its pangs and its worry is torturing me.

lines.gurmukhi: praupkwr kIjY lwln mnwie dIjY qo pr AnMq srbMs bilhwrY hYN ]663]
lines.transliteration_english: Paraoupakaar Keejai Laalan Manaai Deejai , To Par Anant Sarabans Balihaarai Hain ?663?

Shabad OS B.translation: O friend beloved of my Lord! do me a favour and bring around my separated Lord husband. And for such a favour, I will sacrifice all that I have many times over you.  (663)
